Description:
Detects potential DLL sideloading of DLLs that are known to be abused from suspicious locations

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Abusable DLL Potential Sideloading From Suspicious Location
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((image_loaded like '%\coreclr.dll' or image_loaded like '%\facesdk.dll' or image_loaded like '%\hpcustpartui.dll' or image_loaded like '%\libcef.dll' or image_loaded like '%\zipdll.dll') and ((image_loaded like '%:\perflogs\%' or image_loaded like '%:\users\public\%' or image_loaded like '%\temporary internet%' or image_loaded like '%\windows\temp\%') or ((image_loaded like '%:\users\%' and image_loaded like '%\favorites\%') and (image_loaded like '%:\users\%' and image_loaded like '%\favourites\%') and (image_loaded like '%:\users\%' and image_loaded like '%\contacts\%') and (image_loaded like '%:\users\%' and image_loaded like '%\pictures\%'))))
